rename.from: wayland - key repeat timer race condition causing freeze
rename.to: Key repeat timer race condition causing freeze

body: Reverse engineered GTA 3 and Vice City (re3 and reVC) freeze within 1~3 minutes of playing on wayland, patching current glfw upstream with the change from this pull request https://github.com/glfw/glfw/pull/1711 fixes it.
